title: True Crime New York City with crack for PC
description:
True Crime: New York City

ESRB rating: Mature
Game information: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/True_Crime:_New_York_City

Instructions
1. Burn or mount with Daemon Tools. 
   > Note: You have to mount the *.bin files, NOT the *.cue!
   > Problems where reported when mounting with MagicISO, use another software (Daemon tools is a recommendation) Feedback by: Jordanidk
2. Install the game.
3. Copy over the cracked content from the /Crack/ directory in CD1 to your installation directory.
   > Don't forget about the crack! (again, it is located in CD1)
4. Play the game =).
   > Vista users has to run the game as administrator to get it working! To do soRight-click the shortcut/exe>Properties>Compability>Mark the "Run as administrator"-checkbox. Feedback by: Algeo




Enjoy =)
